social_posts.post_text:
🥰 Greetings, friends of the Instaland!!! 🥰
.
I know it's been a hot second since posting (Ahem...over a month!! 😬 Who am I?! 🤣🤣🤣) but after taking a break and finally being able to come up for air, I had to pop on to thank you. Yes, YOU!!!!
.
2022 was another incredible year for Montana Crochet and it's all because of each and every one of you!!! 🥹❤️ Every single like, comment, share, and word of encouragement is what fuels my spirit & creativity, and allows me to continue living this yarny dream of mine. Thank you from the very bottom of my heart, friends!!! We couldn't do it without YOU!!! ❤️🥹🥰
.
We have sooooo many fun things planned for the next year I can hardly wait to begin revealing allll the things, so buckle up and strap yourselves in for the ride pals!!! 2023 begins tomorrow and so do the reveals!!!! 🎉🥳🎉🥳🎉🥳
-----------------------

🎉 ANNOUNCEMENT!! 🎉
.
Helloooooo, friends!!! We are beyond excited to announce that this year we will be doing things differently around here and it's finally time to share some details!!!
.
Each month throughout the year we will be offering a Montana Crochet kit as well as three of our favorite colorways that we've created in past years!!!
.
For January we are bringing back #mountainpeakshawl kits (Swipe to see all five options!) as well as Woodland Walk, Lake Abundance, and Seattle on four different bases!!!
.
Everything will be available the second Sunday each month and will ship approximately two weeks after ordering, or earlier if we can!!
.
I can't wait for you to see everything that we have lined up this year and hope you're as excited about our plan as we are!! Feel free to ask any questions below!!
.
Cheers, pals!!! Remember to take care of yourself today and get some stitches in if you can!! 🧶🥰❤️
-------------------------
Kits: Mountain Peak Shawl featuring a single skein of @montana.crochet Sock & Mohair
Monthly Colorways: Woodland Walk, Lake Abundance, and Seattle - available on Sock, Nylon Sport (NEW!!), DK, and Worsted weights
-------------------------

.

.
- Wild West
- Bunny Trail
- Little Ewe
- Mist over the Madison
.

.
Cheers, friends!! Make sure to take care of yourself today and get some stitches in if you can!! ❤️

🌲🌲TOMORROW!!!🌲🌲
.
Happy Saturday, friends!!! It's a beautiful morning here in Montana and I'm about ready to sit and get a few stitches in before running errands with the kids, so I thought it would be a good time to introduce you to our January colorways of the month!
.
Meet Woodland Walk, Lake Abundance, and Seattle!! Equal parts luscious and vibrant, these beauties can come together as a stunning fade or easily shine on their own!!
.
They'll be available on Sock, Nylon Sport (NEW!), DK & Worsted weights, and we will keep the pre-order open through Tuesday January 10th!!
.
Do you have a personal favorite out of the three? if I had to choose, it's gotta be Woodland Walk - only because it was one of the first colorways I EVER dyed!! Isn't that wild?! 🤯🥰🤗
.
Have a stellar day, pals!! Feel free to ask any questions about tomorrow's update below if you have them, I'll do my best to get back to everyone throughout the day! ❤️🧶❤️
----------------------
Yarn: Woodland Walk, Lake Abundance, & Seattle on @montana.crochet Sock, Nylon Sport, DK, and Worsted weights - Available tomorrow 1/8 at 2PM MST!!

✨ NEW PATTERN!!!! ✨
.
Happy Tuesday, friends!!! Today is the kickoff of our first ever Montana Crochet-Along and to celebrate I want to introduce you to one of two (Yes, two!) new patterns to the Montana Crochet shop!!
.
Say hello to the Willow Creek Wrap!! Named after a creek that runs next to a family cabin that we made such special memories in, it features a great way to use up mini skeins and simple but stunning lace sections that make this the perfect project for an adventurous beginner!!
.
This wrap uses one full skein, two 50g skeins (Another full skein would work perfectly!), as well as six mini skeins. For the next 24 hours you can get 20% off this pattern as well as every design in the shop by using the code: MTCAL23 ✨🎉✨
.
Stay tuned for more, friends!!! Will you be participating in our CAL this year? Need more details? Head to our stories or the website for more!!
----------------------
Pattern: Willow Creek Wrap by @montana.crochet - Available now!!!
Yarn: Wild West, Bunny Trail, Little Ewe, Mist over the Madison, Dusk on the Prairie, Huckleberry Pickin', Skies above Andesite, Yogo, and Headwaters on @montana.crochet Sock Weight
-----------------------
#montanacrochet #montanacrochetyarns #montanavibes #montanainspired #willowcreekwrap #crochetpattern #crochetdesign #crochetartist #crochetaddict #crochet_relax #crochetshawl #crochetwrap #crochetdesign #crochetdesigner

✨🌲MONTANA CROCHET-ALONG 2023!! 🌲✨
.
The day is finally here friends!! Though I've mentioned the CAL plenty of times in my stories and a little bit here and there in posts, with the CAL finally kicking off today it was high time that the details finally got a permanent place in the feed!! 🥰😁
.
All you need to do to participate is begin, work on, or finish a project that either uses Montana Crochet yarn or a Montana Crochet pattern! (Knits, Tunisian, and any other yarn crafts included!!!!) Make sure to share your progress here on Instagram and use the hashtag #montanacrochetalong2023 for your chance to win!

Weekly prizes include $25, $50, $75, & $100 gift cards as well as other surprises throughout the weeks!
The Crochet-Along will run from 1/10 - 2/7 and you can work at whatever pace you’re comfortable with!
.
Shown here are a few of my favorite designs from the shop (I'll detail them below!) and for the next 24 hours if you use the code MTCAL23 you can snag any of them for 20% off!!
.
Any questions? Feel free to drop them below, friends!! I sure hope you'll join along!!! ❤️🥰❤️
-----------------------
Patterns: (From top left, clockwise)
- #goldrushshawl With added fringe!
- #montanameadowsshawl
- #ridgelinewrap
- #aspirationshawl
- #goldrushshawl
- #tunisianfadeshawl
- #montanashawl
- #bigskyblanket
------------------------

✨NEW PATTERN!!!!✨
.
Happy happy Wednesday, friends!!! Today I am so excited to introduce you to the second of two brand new designs now available in the Montana Crochet shop!!
.
Say hello to the Silver Gate Scarf!!! 🌲🏔️🌲 Named after  the teensy tiny mountain town where my Great-Great Grandfather built our first family cabin (Only a mile from what would become Yellowstone National Park! 🤯) this scarf uses DK weight yarn, the simple moss stitch (A personal favorite!), and creates the most gorgeous color fade!!
.
It requires one full skein, two 50g skeins (An additional full skein works too!), as well as six mini skeins. 👌🏼🧶 For the remainder of the day you can use the code MTCAL23 for 20% off this pattern as well as all other designs in the shop!!
.
I have to give a huge shout out to everyone who has snagged a pattern already, y'all have made the release of the #willowcreekwrap a huge success beyond what I could have ever imagined!!! Thank you doesn't even begin to cover it, just know that my heart is so warm and I am beyond grateful to each and every one of you!!! 🥰😭🥹
----------------------
Pattern: Silver Gate Scarf by @montana.crochet - Available Now!!!
Yarn: Wild West, Bunny Trail, Little Ewe, Mist over the Madison, Dusk on the Prairie, Huckleberry Pickin', Skies Above Andesite, Yogo, and Headwaters on @montana.crochet DK Weight
----------------------

✨ WEEK 1 - CAL CHECK IN!! ✨
.
Happy Tuesday, friends!! How's everyone progressing after the first full week of the Montana Crochet-Along??!!! 🤩🤩🤩 Hopefully you've been able to dig through your stash, or maybe pick up a WIP that's been on the back burner...either way, I want to hear alllll the things!! Y'all have been sharing so many gorgeous projects over the last week and I am absolutely blown away seeing everyone's color pairings and design choices!!
.
I'll be sharing the Week 1 Winner ($25 Gift Card to the Montana Crochet shop!) in my stories later this afternoon, so take a peek there to see if you've won!
.
This week's prize is a $50 Gift Card to the shop as well as a free pattern of choice, so keep on sharing your progress using the hashtag #montanacrochetalong2023 for your chance to win!!
.
On the crochet front over here, I'll be completely honest and tell you I'm still toying between all four of these designs here!! 🫠🙃🤣 (In typical fashion, of course I can't decide! 🤣) What do you think I should make for the CAL? It's down to the #montanashawl, another #junipercowl, a #ridgelinewrap, or the #aspirationshawl...which one do you think I should work on? Drop your opinion below!!!!
-------------------------

✨ RANCHER SHAWL KITS!! ✨
.
Helloooooo, friends!! I just wanted to jump on real quick and let everyone know that we're shipping the last batch of #ranchershawl kits today and tomorrow!! I was insanely honored for @tlyarncrafts to design such an amazing pattern with our yarn and am thrilled with all the support and love the kits have received!! Thank you, thank you, thank you!!! 💗🥹💗🥹💗
.
Next week we're dyeing up all the January Kits & Colorways and then we'll be moving onto all that February is gonna bring (Hint: All you Ghost Town and Copper Kings lovers are gonna be happy!! 😉) but I'd love to know if y'all would like to see the colorways from the Rancher Shawl kits come back sometime this year? If so, would you like full sized skeins? 50g skeins? Alllll the minis? 🤩 Let me know your thoughts!!!

:: CLOSED :: 🎉 BIRTHDAY GIFT-AWAY!!! 🎉
.
Happy Monday, friends!!! Today I'm turning 38 and to celebrate another trip around the sun, I'd like to gift a complete set of 12 Rancher Mini Skeins to one lucky winner!!
.
To enter:
- Make sure you "like" and "save" this post!
- Follow @montana.crochet
- Comment below telling me how you'd like to spend your ideal Birthday!!
- Tag all your yarn loving friends!! ❤️🧶❤️ (In separate comments)
- Share the gift-away in your stories for an extra five entries if you like! (Make sure to tag me so I can seeeee!)
.
The Gift-Away will run from today through Wednesday the 25th at 6AM MST - with the winner announced in my stories shortly thereafter!! Just in case you need a reminder, I will NEVER ask you for your credit card information and if someone does, know that they're a scammy poser and you should block and report them immediately!!
.
Good luck, everyone!! Have a stellar day and try to get some stitches in if you can!! ❤️🥰❤️
--------------------
Yarn: Rancher Mini Skeins on @montana.crochet Single Sock - Available in the shop NOW!!

✌🏼SUNDAY VIBES!!✌🏼
.
It may be frigid cold and snowy outside here in Montana, but it's definitely gonna be a color filled day up in this house!! 💜💖🧡 
.
This design initially started off as scribbled pattern notes that were written down a few years back buried in a notebook. I went to use that notebook for something new and came across said pattern notes and was like, huh - wonder what this was gonna be??? After a short time of figuring out what the heck I was thinking when I wrote it down (🤣🙃🫠) it has now turned into a design that is absolutely flying off my hooks!! ❤️🤩❤️ I can't wait to show y'all more!!
.
Hope everyone has a warm and cozy day ahead! Remember to take some time for yourself and get some stitches in if you can!! 💖🧶💗

Pattern: Currently nameless, working on that part... 🤣🤣🤣

🧡 FEBRUARY COLORWAYS!! 🧡
.
Coming to the update on Sunday are three of my absolute *favorite* Montana Crochet colorways...Copper Kings, Ghost Town, and Levi's!! Each of these has the ability to stand on their own and shine in the most bold of ways, but my goodness when all three are together they really do pack a punch!! 🤩 (I see a sweater with Copper Kings in my personal future!! 🧡🔥🧡) 
.
Each colorway will be available on Sock, Nylon Sport, DK, and Worsted weights (Swipe to take a look at the colorways on each base!) and we will keep the pre-order open for 48 hours, after which we'll shut the shop down to begin dyeing orders!!
.
Tell me, do you have a favorite of the three? I'd love to know what you're hoping to snag and what you're planning to create!! Pop it in the comments if you have a sec so we can all swoon!!
.
Ta-ta for now, friends!! Have a stellar day!!

.
We've got our Tweed Collection (Including mini skeins!), Belmont Cowl Kits, & our February Colorways all live on the site now!!
.

I started this blanket last month to use up a bunch of DK weight skeins I've been collecting from my favorite indie yarn dyers over the years and lemme tell you it's been soooo much fun to work on!
.
In other more transparent news, I hope everyone is surviving the month okay. TBH February tends to be one of the most difficult times of the year for me (Helloooooo seasonal depression/anxiety/restlessness) so just know I'm sending a big hug and high five to anyone who needs a little extra support. 🥰
.

This month the Montana Shawl in all its textured fringe-filled squishy goodness is our featured crochet kit!!! It features mostly simple stitches, with maybe a few new techniques - and I can assure you this shawl is perfect for an intermediate or an advanced beginner crocheter!! Looking for a stunning statement piece for dancing out on the town or just chilling on the patio with a drink in hand? I've got you!!! And that sultry drape? Oh my gosh y'all, it is soooo good!!
.
In addition to the shawl kits we also have our July Mini skein yarn club available as well, so head on over to the link in my Bio or visit the links in my stories to check everything out!

Nineteen years ago today, on a beautiful morning almost identical to this one, I learned that my Dad and little brother Alex, died in a house fire overnight.
.
I'll never forget sitting on my couch in the Summer sunshine that morning and seeing the Police Chaplain roll up in front of my house - I was confused. What was he doing here, at my house?? 
.
His words, the moment he told me what happened, they still play in my head in the slowest of motions. Losing them both in one fail swoop was something that consumed me and my family for a long, long time. 
.
I miss them. I wish so many things. But if they were still here today, I know so deeply that they would be so damn proud. Proud of the mother I am. The woman I have grown into.
.
So friends, please hold your loved ones tight. Live a life filled with wonder, but especially without regret. And dammit, say I love you as much as you possibly can. ❤️
.
PS - These tacos are for you two. ❤️🌮❤️

🗻 STRATIGRAPHIC COWL!! 🗻
.
Happy Hump Day, pals!! Today is your last chance to snag one of our Stratigraphic Cowl Kits, designed in collaboration with Tara of @taralovescrochet!!
.
For this Cowl design, Tara prepared six different stitch patterns that fit together like rock layers, you can put them in whatever order you choose! You can copy the randomized pattern, do the stitches in order from 1-6, or roll a dice to choose the next stitch! Don’t like the roll? Roll again!! There’s no rules here! All our cowls will be the same size, and begin and end the same way, but each will be its own adventure along the way!!!
.
Perfect for a weekend project and especially tailored to gift giving (Tis the season, y'all know it's coming!! 😅😅😅) head to @taralovescrochet to snag your copy!
.
Listings for kits and all Fall Collection colorways will close down at 8PM this evening. This will be our last pre-order of the year so make sure to snag some squish while you can!!
